name: Roger Rockwell
descriptions: Roger Rockwell is one of the inhabitants of Vault 112 trapped within the Tranquility Lane virtual reality simulation in Fallout 3.
While Roger eventually managed to convince Janet that nothing was going on between them, few aside from Janet believe it.
He plays it off as just "women's troubles,"

Rockwell's vitals indicate a state of elevated stress: 85 beats per minute, 140/90 mmHg of blood pressure, 98.7°F/37.05°C temperature, and 22 breaths per minute, similar to Timmy Neusbaum and Martha Simpson.

When looking at resident IDs, Roger Rockwell and Martha Simpson have adjacent IDs (226 and 227 respectively), while Janet Simpson has the ID 115. As such, it's entirely possible that Rockwell and Simpson were originally a couple, rather than Janet.

topics.response_text: How did it come to this? I just don't understand...
You won't find a day like this anywhere else!

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about the neighborhood?
topics.response_text: Heck of a place to live. Janet and I... well, we're... quite happy here.
He disappeared on you, huh? Don't worry, I'm sure you'll find him soon.

topics.topic: MQ04ResidentRockwellsCan you tell me anything about the Rockwells' marriage?
topics.topic_text: Anything you want to tell me about your marriage?
topics.response_text: Now see here. That's not anything for you to be asking about. Our marriage is our business, and it's private.{annoyed}

topics.topic: MQ04ResidentSimulationThis is a pretty convincing simulation...
topics.topic_text: None of this is real. It's all some crazy experiment.
topics.response_text: Sure, sport. Whatever you say! Ha, ha.{amused, dismissive}

topics.topic_text: Betty wants me to break up your marriage.
topics.response_text: Now that's not funny. Not one bit.

topics.topic_text: Bad news, Roger. Your wife is a psychopath.
topics.response_text: What? What are you talking about?{shrugging it off as a joke}

topics.topic_text: Look at this. It's her rolling pin, covered in blood. Martha's blood.
Janet snapped. She killed Martha in cold blood. Look at this rolling pin.
topics.response_text: Oh my God, what is that? Is that blood? And... brains?{horrified}

topics.topic_text: Martha Simpson is dead, and Janet killed her! Look, here's her rolling pin...

conversation.response_text: Right. Sure, thanks for asking. Well, I'll see you later.{embarrassed, trying to be friendly}
Janet... You think maybe we should have a talk about children?{hesitant}
Who told you that? They're lying, I swear it!
I have no idea what you're talking about Janet. Just calm down, and let's work this out.
What's wrong with being in the basement? What the hell is going on?
You should be in a sanitarium, or a prison! You're out of your damned mind! You just stay away from me, you hear me?{frightened}
Yes, of course. I'm fine, Janet's fine. Everything is just fine. And... And you?{defensive, trying to be friendly}
Okay, sorry for bringing it up.{dejected}
